metadata.title: CVE-2019-13768 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in FileAPI in Google Chrome prior to 72.0.3626.81 allowed aremote attacker to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chrome security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
